query: SELECT o.id, o.status, o.total_cost, o.zip_url, o.created_at, o.updated_at, oi.sku, oi.status as item_status, oi.error_message, oi.image_count FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id WHERE o.id = 270020;
